result.eng: When he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.
result.ga: ar imeacht dó dúirt fionn go mbeadh sé ar ais
result.orig: ar imeacht dó dúirt fionn go mbeadh sé ar ais
result.html: ar imeacht dó dúirt fionn go mbeadh sé ar aisWhen he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.
result.ponchtml: ar imeaċt dó dúirt fionn go mbeaḋ sé ar aisWhen he was leaving, Fionn said he would be back.

result.eng: I just said that for fun.
result.ga: ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sin
result.orig: ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sin
result.html: ar mhaithe le greann a dúirt mé sinI just said that for fun.
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫe le greann a dúirt mé sinI just said that for fun.

result.eng: They put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ga: chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.orig: chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.html: chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ponchtml: ċuir siad a gcoṁairlí i dteannta a ċéile agus dúirt siad gurḃ ḟearr an duais a ṫaḃairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.

result.eng: I said goodbye to my mother and left.
result.ga: d'fhág mé slán ag mo mháthair agus d'imigh mé
result.orig: d'fhág mé slán ag mo mháthair agus d'imigh mé
result.html: d'fhág mé slán ag mo mháthair agus d'imigh méI said goodbye to my mother and left.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág mé slán ag mo ṁáṫair agus d'imiġ méI said goodbye to my mother and left.

result.eng: I said to myself that I would get up very early in the morning.
result.ga: dúirt mé liom féin go n-éireoinn an-mhoch ar maidin
result.orig: dúirt mé liom féin go n-éireoinn an-mhoch ar maidin
result.html: dúirt mé liom féin go n-éireoinn an-mhoch ar maidinI said to myself that I would get up very early in the morning.
result.ponchtml: dúirt mé liom féin go n-éireoinn an-ṁoċ ar maidinI said to myself that I would get up very early in the morning.

result.html: dúirt sí an pasfhocalShe said the password.
result.ponchtml: dúirt sí an pasḟocalShe said the password.

result.eng: She said the pub was closed.
result.ga: dúirt sí go raibh an pub dúnta
result.orig: dúirt sí go raibh an pub dúnta
result.html: dúirt sí go raibh an pub dúntaShe said the pub was closed.
result.ponchtml: dúirt sí go raiḃ an pub dúntaShe said the pub was closed.

result.eng: As for the thing you said, you are right, but...
result.ga: maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat ach
result.orig: maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat ach
result.html: maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat achAs for the thing you said, you are right, but...
result.ponchtml: maidir leis an rud a dúirt tusa tá an ceart agat aċAs for the thing you said, you are right, but...

result.eng: Like I said the other day, ...
result.ga: mar a dúirt mé an lá cheana
result.orig: mar a dúirt mé an lá cheana
result.html: mar a dúirt mé an lá cheanaLike I said the other day, ...
result.ponchtml: mar a dúirt mé an lá ċeanaLike I said the other day, ...

result.eng: We did as we said we would.
result.ga: rinne muid beart de réir briathair
result.orig: rinne muid beart de réir briathair
result.html: rinne muid beart de réir briathairWe did as we said we would.
result.ponchtml: rinne muid beart de réir briaṫairWe did as we said we would.

result.html: tá dóthain ráite agamI have said enough.
result.ponchtml: tá dóṫain ráite agamI have said enough.

result.eng: She wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ga: níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.orig: níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focal
result.html: níor bhean í a chuaigh siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].
result.ponchtml: níor ḃean í a ċuaiġ siar ar a focalShe wasn't a woman who'd go back on her word [who wouldn't do what she'd said she'd do].

result.eng: I wish I had never said that.
result.ga: faraor go ndúirt mé a leithéid
result.orig: faraor go ndúirt mé a leithéid
result.html: faraor go ndúirt mé a leithéidI wish I had never said that.
result.ponchtml: faraor go ndúirt mé a leiṫéidI wish I had never said that.

result.eng: There are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ga: tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin seasaim leo araon
result.orig: tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin seasaim leo araon
result.html: tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin seasaim leo araonThere are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ponchtml: tá idir ḟíricí agus ḃreiṫiúnas sa ṁéid sin seasaim leo araonThere are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.

result.eng: We said goodbye to each other for the night.
result.ga: d'fhág muid slán ag a chéile don oíche
result.orig: d'fhág muid slán ag a chéile don oíche
result.html: d'fhág muid slán ag a chéile don oícheWe said goodbye to each other for the night.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág muid slán ag a ċéile don oíċeWe said goodbye to each other for the night.

result.ga: ná déan a dúirt an fear
result.orig: ná déan a dúirt an fear
result.html: ná déan a dúirt an fear"Don't do it," the man said.
result.ponchtml: ná déan a dúirt an fear"Don't do it," the man said.

result.eng: It was said that he was well-off.
result.ga: bhí iomrá go raibh sé ina sháith den tsaol
result.orig: bhí iomrá go raibh sé ina sháith den tsaol
result.html: bhí iomrá go raibh sé ina sháith den tsaolIt was said that he was well-off.
result.ponchtml: ḃí iomrá go raiḃ sé ina ẛáiṫ den tsaolIt was said that he was well-off.

result.eng: Everybody in the house said in unison.
result.ga: arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéile
result.orig: arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéile
result.html: arsa bunadh an tí as béal a chéileEverybody in the house said in unison.
result.ponchtml: arsa bunaḋ an tí as béal a ċéileEverybody in the house said in unison.

result.eng: Then he realized he shouldn't have said that.
result.ga: ansin smaoinigh sé nach raibh sin inráite aige
result.orig: ansin smaoinigh sé nach raibh sin inráite aige
result.html: ansin smaoinigh sé nach raibh sin inráite aigeThen he realized he shouldn't have said that.
result.ponchtml: ansin smaoiniġ sé naċ raiḃ sin inráite aigeThen he realized he shouldn't have said that.
